1.title: Congress removes Digvijaya Singh as party in charge of Goa, Karnataka
1.body:
NEW DELHI: The Congress has removed Digvijaya Singh as the party in charge of Goa and Karnataka.
Digvijaya had come in for a lot of criticism after the Congress failed to form the government in Goa, despite the party emerging as the single largest party in the assembly elections.

2.title: Don't view triple talaq issue through prism of politics, PM Modi urges Muslims
2.body: Batting for equality for Muslim women, Prime Minister Narendra Modi today appealed to the 'enlightened' members of the community to not see the triple talaq issue from the prism of politics.

3.title: CM Adityanath slams Akhilesh, Kejriwal; says EVM means 'every vote for Modi'
3.body:
Citizens of Delhi in the recent MCD polls have also proved that EVM stands for 'Every Vote Modi' :UP CM Yogi Adityanath pic.
com/3j0BYqHtZk— ANI UP (@ANINewsUP) April 29, 2017 Citizens of Delhi in the recent MCD polls have also proved that EVM stands for 'Every Vote Modi' :UP CM Yogi Adityanath pic.

4.title: Pak Army 'Rejects' Nawaz Sharif's Decision To Sack Aide Tariq Fatemi After News Leak
4.body: His statement was believed to be an effort to deflect the criticism by experts and Opposition after the army rejected the letter by the Prime Minister to sack Mr Fatemi.

5.title: IPL Live Cricket Score, GL vs MI: Andrew Tye, James Faulkner Provide Late Fireworks For Gujarat vs Mumbai
5.body:
21:11 IST: With just five overs remaining in the game, Gujarat Lions have to look for a partnership and put away the balls to cross the 150-mark.
19:30 IST: Hello and welcome to the live blog of the match between Gujarat Lions and Mumbai Indians.

6.title: IPL 2017: Royal Bangalore Challengers All But Out Of Contention For Playoffs After Loss To Rising Pune Supergiant
6.body: Formidable Royal Challengers Bangalore (RCB) led by India captain Virat Kohli became the first team to be almost thrown out of contention for play-offs after a humiliating 61-run defeat against Rising Pune Supergiant (RPS) in an Indian Premier League encounter on Saturday.

7.title: Video: Shahid Kapoor dancing with his daughter Misha is the cutest thing you'll see all weekend
7.body:
Shahid shared the video with the caption, "#worlddanceday #havefeetwilldance #mj dance is in your blood." Well, Misha has certainly got dance in her genes.
A post shared by Shahid Kapoor (@shahidkapoor) on Apr 29, 2017 at 1:50am PDT.

8.title: Voters have shown EVM stands for 'every vote Modi', says UP CM Yogi Adityanath
8.body: GORAKHPUR: The Delhi MCD results have given a befitting reply to those raising question about EVMs and people have shown these alphabets stand for 'every vote Modi', Uttar Pradesh Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath said on Saturday.

9.title: Kejriwal knowingly commits mistakes and pulls stunt of apologising: Manoj Tiwari
9.body: Two days after the Bharatiya Janata Party (BJP) retained power in Delhi’s three municipal corporations for a third consecutive term, its Delhi chief launched a stinging attack on chief minister Arvind Kejriwal saying that the AAP leader has a record of wilfully committing mistakes and then seeking an apology.

10.title: Virat Kohli fifty in vain, Rising Pune Supergiant thrash Royal Challengers Bangalore
10.body: (UPDATES |SCORECARD)Lockie Ferguson’s 4-1-7-2 and Imran Tahir’s 3/18 helped Pune restrict Royal Challengers to 96 for nine in 20 overs in reply to 157/3 to win the match by 61 runs at the MCA Stadium on Saturday.
